content.html: instead of a billionaire's fiefdom run by thousands of people, you get a hobby sysadmin's fiefdom run by a hobby sysadmin and connected to 1 billion other fiefdoms sorry your friend's account is gone because someone forgot to pay for the linode it lived on
content.value:
instead of a billionaire's fiefdom run by thousands of people, you get a hobby sysadmin's fiefdom run by a hobby sysadmin and connected to 1 billion other fiefdoms

sorry your friend's account is gone because someone forgot to pay for the linode it lived on
